feed.title: TorchCraftAI Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest TorchCraftAI news and events.

entry.title: Releasing CherryVis: a replay viewer for TorchCraftAI
entry.summary: We're glad to announce today that we are open sourcing CherryVis. Based on OpenBW's replay viewer, CherryVis allows you to to view StarCraft replays alongside information about the bot's state. It's a powerful tool to both understand, develop and d...

entry.title: Build Order Switch Retraining Has Arrived
entry.summary: For this year's AIIDE competition, we deployed a machine learning model for high-level strategy selection dubbed Build Order Switch (BOS). Our competition model was trained by playing against publicly available bots, e.g. from the SSCAIT ladder. Natu...

entry.title: Hello, Github!
entry.summary:
The CherryPi team at Facebook AI Research is very happy to open source TorchCraftAI on github. We benefitted from the StarCraft AI bot community, and we are proud to give back.

TorchCraftAI is a platform that lets you build agents to play (and learn ...
